definition: generic name for hemp, flax etc/hemp or flax fiber for textile materials/sesame/CL:縷|缕[lu:3]/(of materials) rough or coarse/pocked/pitted/to have pins and needles or tingling/to feel numb
oil/fat/grease/petroleum/to apply tung oil, paint or varnish/oily/greasy/glib/cunning

sentences.english: If you want your baby born early, you can eat scrambled eggs castor oil .
sentences.chinese: 如果想让宝宝早些出生，你可以吃些蓖麻油炒鸡蛋。

sentences.english: Turkey Red Oil is derived from Castor Oil which has been treated to be fully dispersible in water.
sentences.chinese: 土耳其红油是来自蓖麻油已治疗得到充分分散在水中。

sentences.english: Sprinkle with the chopped spring onions and drizzle in light soya sauce and sesame oil.
sentences.chinese: 洒入葱花，淋上生抽麻油即可食用。

sentences.english: And that's all, unless we count glue, and linseed oil which I used for finishing.
sentences.chinese: 这一切，除非我们指望胶水，亚麻油，我用来整理。

sentences.english: Yeah, this is the same plant that gives us the beneficial castor oil .
sentences.chinese: 蓖麻是一种为我们提供有益的蓖麻油的植物。

sentences.english: Pigment mixed with drying oil , exp . linseed oil.
sentences.chinese: 和亚麻油等干性油混制成的颜料。

sentences.english: Drizzle the remaining teaspoon of sesame oil over the top.
sentences.chinese: 在上面撒上剩余的芝麻油。

sentences.english: Finally, coated with a layer of sesame oil, golden yellow cake made of .
sentences.chinese: 最后在表面涂一层麻油，金黄金黄的糕做成了。

sentences.english: Sometimes castor oil can also be used as an ebullient.
sentences.chinese: 有时蓖麻油还可以用作了热情洋溢。

sentences.english: Boiled linseed oil is low in viscosity and available in pale or dark colors.
sentences.chinese: 沸制亚麻油粘度低，为浅颜色或深颜色。

sentences.english: You can find soybean sauce and sesame oil in that aisle.
sentences.chinese: 你可以在那个走道找到酱油跟麻油。

sentences.english: As one of the renewable resources, the castor oil shows higher economic value.
sentences.chinese: 蓖麻油作为一种可再生资源，具有较高工业经济价值。

sentences.english: Mix minced pork with light soya sauce, white pepper, sesame oil and egg together.
sentences.chinese: 将猪肉碎，酱清，白胡椒粉，麻油，和鸡蛋混合搅拌。

sentences.english: There were a lot of national reports on the sesamin extracting from sesame oil but little from sesame meal.
sentences.chinese: 国内报道有关芝麻素的提取主要是从芝麻油中进行。

sentences.english: Much of the food is fried and there is greater use of sesame oil and vinegar.
sentences.chinese: 沪菜中多数是炒菜，麻油和醋放得较多。

sentences.english: Western medicine actually recommends some of the exact same ingredients that make up the chicken hot pot dish.
sentences.chinese: 西方医学确实建议摄食几种和麻油鸡材料相同的成份。

definition: chicken bouillon powder (PRC)/essence of chicken, concentrated chicken stock sold as a tonic (Tw)
soy sauce (chiefly in Cantonese and Hakka areas)
